basics.name: Nick Izawa
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am currently pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in the Spring of 2018.

work.company: Curriculum Research & Development Group, College of Education
work.summary: CRDG is an organized research unit in the College of Education at the University of Hawai‘i Mānoa. Currently working on a research project funded by the National Science Foundation that is aimed at broadening the Native Hawaiian Engineering faculty at UHM. Also helped with Hawaii GenCyber 2016 and created course resources for teacher education.
highlights: Collected and analyzed survey data, transcribed interviews, analyzed transcriptions, graphic design, and general clerical work
Created web-assets for the American Education Research Association (AERA)
